# Canadian Government Tender Announcement
### Tender Title
EW699-230708B Akpatok Island Remediation

### Tender Details
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3835228419-Doc3929239530 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3835228419 |
| Tender Publication Date | 21 March 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | 5 April 2023 2:00:00 PM EST |

### Service Requirements
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to participate in the remediation of Akpatok Island. The work includes hazardous waste disposal services.

### Important Details
- **Type of Tender**: Competitive - Traditional
- **Evaluation Criteria**: Technical Merit and Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Region of Opportunity**: Nunavut Territory
- **Region of Delivery**: Nunavut Territory

### Contract Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada
- **Contact Person**: Danielle Graham (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: [danielle.graham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.graham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information
This tender was previously announced, and only bidders from the previous solicitation are invited to participate in this limitedly tendered notice.
